definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: The two battled, but their magic collided left them cursed.
sentences.chinese: 兩個戰鬥，但他們的魔法相撞，給他們留下千古罵名。

sentences.english: As our consumer attitudes have changed, criticism of the industry has only intensified.
sentences.chinese: 隨着消費觀念的轉變，水工業揹負的罵名越來越多。
